text: Javier Carrión (born 9 November 1990) is a Spanish rugby sevens player. He competed for the Spanish rugby sevens team at the 2016 Summer Olympics. He was part of the team that won the 2016 Men's Rugby Sevens Final Olympic Qualification Tournament in Monaco. Carrión was also part of their 2013 Rugby World Cup Sevens squad. == References == == External links == * * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Rugby sevens players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic rugby sevens players of Spain Category:Spain international rugby sevens players
title: Javier Carrión
